hero.title: Scorus GYM
hero.subtitle: Your space. Your pace. Your music.

about.title: A Different Gym
about.description_1: Scorus GYM is not a conventional gym. It's a space designed for people seeking real results with personalized attention.
about.description_2: Boutique facilities with state-of-the-art equipment, motivating environment and over 15 years of experience in the sector.

private.title: Your Space, Your Pace, Your Music
private.description: Private sessions in the complete gym just for you. Choose your music, your schedule and train without distractions.

personal.title: In-Person Training
personal.description: One-to-one personalized sessions with complete tracking of your progress.

cta.title: Ready To Train?
cta.description: Schedule your first session and discover the difference of training in a boutique gym
